name: Wadden Robot Spotball League 2084
description:
Wadden RSL 2084 is the most advanced spotball experience you will ever have. Watch as your favorite robo team goes head to head in a 3-way match of cunning, geometry, and engineering in the most dynamic season yet.

This. Is. SPOTBALL!

Created for the Input Optional Jam 2019, where the goal was to create a game where the user's input (via a controller or button) was considered a feature to the experience.  So, sit back, relax and enjoy the show.

Credits:
-taqueso
-theorange
-piggie
-raujinn

-snowschu

Special thanks to RoboJesus
